Title: Out of Africa
Writer: Karen Blixen (based upon the following: "Out of Africa" and other writings by), Judith Thurman (based upon the following: "Isak Dinesen: The Life of a Story Teller" by), Errol Trzebinski (based upon the following: "Silence Will Speak" by), Kurt Luedtke (screenplay by)
Actors: Meryl Streep, Robert Redford, Klaus Maria Brandauer, Michael Kitchen
Plot: In 20th-century colonial Kenya, a Danish baroness/plantation owner has a passionate love affair with a free-spirited big-game hunter.
